name: Hyper Link
description:
Shoot to meld together a massive cluster of ships and grow as large as possible to get the highest score.

Controls:

WASD - Move your ship(s)

Mouse aim & Left click to fire (and optionally hold down)

Leaderboard shows top 5 global players by score

Music: Level 4 - Monsplaisir

CC0 https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/24344/
